about_the_game:
Pinball Blitz combines arcade pinball with a fast-paced action roguelike. Shape each run with selectable themes, flipper setups, and table upgrades to defeat bosses and achieve high-scores.

Table Select

  • Select a theme that determines the ramps and playfields of your table.
  • Choose a flipper setup that best fits your style.
  • Each theme and flipper setup will have its advantages - find a combo that helps you shoot combos.

Upgrades

  • After completing a set of ramps, choose a table upgrade to propel your game.
  • Upgrades range from multiball to guided rockets - new combinations add to a chaotic run.

Enemies

  • Enemies prevent you from making consistent shots in a variety of different ways.
  • Upgrades you collect will help clear your path and eventually aid you in defeating the final boss wave.
